attributes.action: recognise the importance of post offices to local communities, and act to preserve as many branches as possible in Suffolk and Essex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The closure of 67 post office branches in Suffolk and East Essex has been proposed. The East Anglian Daily Times, which believes the rural network is the life-blood of local communities, is urging its readers to fight the move.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recognise the importance of post offices to local communities, and act to preserve as many branches as possible in Suffolk and Essex."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14601.asp

Prime Minister's Office
